Lancaster.B. F. Good & Company Leaf Tobacco Wareho: B.F. Good & Company Leaf Tobacco Warehouse, also known as the P. Lorillard Company Tobacco Warehouse, is a historic tobacco warehouse located at Lancaster, Lancaster County, Pennsylvania. It was built in 1899–1900, and is a 3 1/2-story, rectangular brick building in the Beaux-Arts style. It sits on a high foundation of gray limestone.
